dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5673 IH: Stop the Trump Electricity Price Hikes Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Barragán (for herself, Ms. Elfreth, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Ms. Randall, Ms. Ansari, Mr. Tran, Ms. Chu, Ms. Bonamici, Mr. Garamendi, Mrs. Trahan, Ms. DeGette, Ms. Salinas, Ms. Hoyle of Oregon, Mr. Carter of Louisiana, Ms. Rivas, Ms. Bynum, Mr. Goldman of New York, Mrs. McClain Delaney, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mr. Peters, Mr. Tonko, Ms. Brownley, Mr. Carson, Ms. McBride, Ms. Jayapal, Ms. Velázquez, Mr. Costa, Ms. Norton, Mr. Fields, Ms. Leger Fernandez, Mr. Mullin, Ms. Lofgren, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Sherman, Ms. Ross, Ms. Castor of Florida, and Mr. Whitesides) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To reinstate all financial assistance awards terminated by the Department of Energy.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop the Trump Electricity Price Hikes Act.

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, all financial assistance awards terminated by the Department of Energy pursuant to the Secretarial Memorandum entitled Ensuring Responsibility for Financial Assistance, dated May 15, 2025, shall be deemed reinstated and shall continue in effect as if such terminations had not occurred.
